# sg-breadcrumb



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                | Type                                       | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `collapsible`     | `collapsible`      | Collapse items on mobile (show only first and last)        | `boolean`                                  | `false`     |
| `customSeparator` | `custom-separator` | Custom separator character (overrides separator prop)      | `string`                                   | `undefined` |
| `maxItems`        | `max-items`        | Maximum items to show before collapsing (when collapsible) | `number`                                   | `4`         |
| `separator`       | `separator`        | Separator style between items                              | `"arrow" \| "chevron" \| "dot" \| "slash"` | `'chevron'` |
| `showHomeIcon`    | `show-home-icon`   | Show home icon for first item                              | `boolean`                                  | `false`     |
| `size`            | `size`             | Size variant                                               | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                     | `'md'`      |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                  |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------- |
|      | Default slot for sg-breadcrumb-item elements |


## Shadow Parts

| Part     | Description               |
| -------- | ------------------------- |
| `"list"` | The ordered list element  |
| `"nav"`  | The nav container element |
